Module Simulator
Package kin.model

Class BodyModel

java.lang.Object
kin.model.ComponentModel
kin.model.BodyModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
FixSidePartModel
public class BodyModel
extends ComponentModel
implements FixSidePartModel
A class that represents the robot's body. All tail components have to be attached to the body. For this, the body specifies a list of connection points. Each component that connects two parts has a fix-side-part that either is the body or the part nearest to the body, and the opposite tail-side-part.
Author:
Jörg Roth (Joerg.Roth@Wireless-earth.org)

      tailComponentModel - all tail components
